nhamilton.game

Class GameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • nhamilton.game.GameLoop
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game

    public abstract class GameLoop
extends java.lang.Object
    Main loop of the game. Subclasses must decide what to do with the init(), update() and render() methods.
    Author:
    Nicholas Hamilton

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLoop(double frames, double ticks)
      Initializes the game loop.

      Prints the current frame rate and update rate.

      Returns the set frames per second.
      double getGoalUPS()
      Returns the set updates per second.
      abstract void init()
      Called at the start of run().
      abstract void render()
      Called when the loop should render.
      void run()
      Main method of the class.
